root.name: The Room
root.description: OverviewThe Room is available on iPhone, iPad and Android. It takes place in an early 20th century room with your character being tasked with solving puzzles that have been laid out by a relative that seems to have made him go insane.An update for the game was released on the 29th of August, 2013 adding an epilogue chapter and teasing a sequel titled 'The Room Two'.GameplayThe gameplay consists of panning to sections of a box that have segmented puzzles built into the box. Puzzles are solved with the use of perspective changes or the use of an eyepiece that is given to you in the tutorial. As the player solves multiple sections of the box layers are shed to reveal a whole new set of puzzles.
